title: European Telecom Operators Launch Eco Rating Plan for Mobile Phones
sub_head: The new rating will evaluate mobile-phone handsets based on 19 sustainability criteria.
body:
Swedish telecommunications operator Telia Co. said Tuesday that it has joined forces with Deutsche Telekom AG, Orange, Telefonica SA and Vodafone Group PLC to launch a new European Eco Rating labeling that would rate the sustainability of mobile phones.
Telia said the initiative was created to provide consistent, accurate information at the point of retail on the environmental impact of producing, using, transporting and disposing of smartphones and feature phones.
